original_text: So he did this to them and delivered them out of the hand of the people of Israel, and they did not kill them.
korean_text: 여호수아가 곧 그대로 그들에게 행하여 그들을 이스라엘 자손의 손에서 건져서 죽이지 못하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: So he did this to them
and delivered them out of the hand of the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성의 손에서 그들을 건져주었다

sentences.original_text: and they did not kill them
